item.title: 11 mile Big Basin hike
item.description: {% imgcap center http://davidbcalhoun.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/2016-01-31-big-basin-hike-gps.jpg 1000 723 GPS track log %} See the interactive GPS track log here. I really needed to get out of Silicon Valley again and go experience nature, so on Sunday I drove over to my favorite hiking spot, Big Basin. There’s a $10 fee to get in and park, but it’s worth it considering it’s about the price of a movie and much more rewarding. I arrived right after the park opened and started my hike to Berry Creek Falls at 8:20am, which is probably the earliest I’ve started there.

item.title: Big Basin October Hike
